title: What are Mapstories?
text1: Mapstories are stories told around the world! The tool provides diverse options to illustrate global connections using places as stations on a globe. By incorporating their own media and content from popular platforms such as YouTube, TikTok, or Google Street View, users aged 13 and above can create interactive Mapstories. This innovative approach combines global learning and education for sustainable development through storytelling.
